Along the way you will visit Death Valley, Yosemite, Carmel and Monterey as well as tour San Francisco, Los Angeles and Napa Valley wineries! Standard Tour (7 Nights) Travel Dates: 9 Nov 25 - 12 Mar 26 Twin per person fr $3,097 Note: ^Tour departs: 10,24 April, 8, 22 May, 5,12,26 June, 10,17,31 July, 14,28 August, 4,18 September, 2,23 October, 6, 27 November, 25 December 2025, 19 February,12 March 2026 Starts: Las Vegas, day 2 at 0800 Ends: Las Vegas 1600 Includes 8 Day Western Frontiers ATI Escorted Group Tour^ including: - 1 night Las Vegas, Luxor Las Vegas (or similar) - 1 night Mammoth Lakes, Mammoth Mountain Inn or Hampton Inn Fresno Airport (or similar) - 1 night Yosemite Gateway, Doubletree by Hilton Modesto (or similar) - 2 nights San Francisco, Hilton San Francisco Union Square (or similar) - 1 night, Central Coast, Historic Santa Maria Inn (or similar) - 1 night Los Angeles, Hilton Los Angeles Airport (or similar) - Expert English speaking ATI tour guide - Transportation by air-conditioned deluxe coach Per Person, from $3,097 Enquire More Deals Enquire *Terms and Conditions It is our policy to present the cost of our holidays inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase . Travel agent professional service fees where charged, will be additional to the advertised prices . Closeout and blackout periods apply over school holidays and peak holiday periods & availability of seats & rooms is likely to be very limited over this time . Valid for sales to 31 Dec 2025. Valid for travel commenced and completed within the period 1 Apr 2025 to 31 Mar 2026 (unless otherwise specified).Family pricing is based on per person cost for 2 adults and 2 children sharing one room and using existing bedding Land Only - Please add on your best available international airfares. Some prices are based on dynamic rates, which means they may be different from the advertised price if it has been varied by the supplier since being advertised by GO Holidays Prices shown are based on per person costs in New Zealand Dollars, for payment by cash, cheque or eftpos only. Credit card sales not permitted unless Travel Agent acts as a merchant. Travel requiring an overnight stay in New Zealand will be at passengers own expense. Events beyond our control such as currency fluctuations and changes to the price of aviation fuel may result in prices variations . Strict cancellation fees apply. Packages are based on consecutive nights. For full terms and conditions and cancellation fees please contact your local travel agent for more information. Trade enquiries via GO Holidays. ISSUE DATE: 20 Dec 24.
